opinion.posture: Petition for post-conviction relief. Appeal, No. 37, March T., 1970, from order of Court of Common Pleas of Dauphin County, Sept. T., 1966, No. 418, opinion by KREIDER, P.J. Submitted March 9, 1970. Richard D. Walker, Public Defender, for appellant; Jerome T. Foerster, Assistant District Attorney, and LeRoy S. Zimmerman, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
